short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualizing current AWS account name for easier navigation in Control Tower environments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To prepare for use, click on the icon after installation and enter and save the correspondence between the account name and account ID in text format as shown below.
```
[AccountName1]
111111111111

[AccountName2]
222222222222
```

Then, when you access the AWS Management Console, this extension allows you to quickly see what account you are currently signed in to.
